messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On August 6, DET. A. B. Gilbert was summoned following reports of stolen artwork from the Elmwood Art Gallery. Key informants were Ms. Walker, the gallery curator, and Mr. Jefferson, a security officer. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. C. D. Franklin - OPERATIONS Det. Gilbert, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective E. F. Harrison and Detective G. H. Irving were deployed to assess the scene. REID 08:45 Art Theft Ms. Walker identified missing paintings, and Mr. Jefferson handed over the night's security footage. Camera. Technician Paula reviewed the tapes. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Gilbert Sr, Det. Harrison, Det. Irving OPERATIONS Lt. Franklin INFORMANT Jefferson, Allen 33 Oak Lane, Elmwood, Georgia 180-735. 93690. REID 08:45 Art Theft By 10:50 AM, Detectives Gilbert, Harrison, and Irving, with guidance from Lieutenant Franklin, spotted an unregistered delivery truck in the footage. Captain I. J. Kingston issued a city-wide alert. Sergeant K. L. Murphy and Sergeant M. N. Newman began canvassing local art dealers. By noon, three suspicious transactions were flagged. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Gilbert Sr, Det. Harrison, Det. Irving OPERATIONS Lt. Franklin AFFIDAVIT - Art Theft Report 1) Gallery Inventory 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Security Tapes 5) Vehicle Details (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE W. Brooks E.A.G.P.D. 25.95 P60 2775 Walker, LUCIA NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 155-3075 DETECTIVE: A. GILBERT ITEM: 60-5200- 102 CRIME: 08:45 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 83445 - CONFIRMED Jane Doe DATE 2/10/24 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. A. B. Gilbert  Officer Context: On August 6, DET. A. B. Gilbert was summoned following reports of stolen artwork from the Elmwood Art Gallery. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. C. D. Franklin  Officer Context: Lt. C. D. Franklin - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective E. F. Harrison  Officer Context: Detective E. F. Harrison and Detective G. H. Irving were deployed to assess the scene. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective G. H. Irving  Officer Context: Detective E. F. Harrison and Detective G. H. Irving were deployed to assess the scene. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Paula  Officer Context: Camera. Technician Paula reviewed the tapes. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: Detective Gilbert  Officer Context: By 10:50 AM, Detectives Gilbert, Harrison, and Irving, with guidance from Lieutenant Franklin, spotted an unregistered delivery truck in the footage. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Harrison  Officer Context: By 10:50 AM, Detectives Gilbert, Harrison, and Irving, with guidance from Lieutenant Franklin, spotted an unregistered delivery truck in the footage. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Irving  Officer Context: By 10:50 AM, Detectives Gilbert, Harrison, and Irving, with guidance from Lieutenant Franklin, spotted an unregistered delivery truck in the footage. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain I. J. Kingston  Officer Context: Captain I. J. Kingston issued a city-wide alert. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant K. L. Murphy  Officer Context: Sergeant K. L. Murphy and Sergeant M. N. Newman began canvassing local art dealers. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant M. N. Newman Officer Context: Sergeant K. L. Murphy and Sergeant M. N. Newman began canvassing local art dealers. Officer Role: Sergeant
